This account is a reserved account and c: This account is a reserved account and can only be claimed for free by the corresponding organization/individual. The free application process will be made public at a later date.
A change of permission means transferrin: A change of permission means transferring ownership or management of this account to another person. Please proceed with caution!
You will lose control of your account pe: You will lose control of your account permanently
Management rights will be transferred to: Management rights will be transferred to someone else (you will still have Owner rights)
You are modifying the Owner rights of {a: You are modifying the Owner rights of {accountName}, after that you will lose control of this account permanently. Please proceed with caution!
After the modification, the ownership of: After the modification, the ownership of {account} is completely transferred to someone else and you will lose control of {account} permanently.
After the change, the management of this: After the change, the management of this account will be transferred to someone else. You will still have Owner rights.
You cannot add new parsing records, and: You cannot add new parsing records, and the number of parsing records cannot exceed {num}
{fieldName} must be greater than or equa: {fieldName} must be greater than or equal to {min}
After the recall, this account will be r: After the recall, this account will be recalled and registration will be reopened.

The payment status of the order register: The payment status of the order registered with {accountName} is not detected, please confirm whether you have paid?
You can go to the administration page to: You can go to the administration page to add a resolution record, renew, etc.
Registration of {accountName} failed! If: Registration of {accountName} failed! If you have already paid the relevant fees, you will be refunded to your payment address within 24 hours (except for transaction fees).
Account names can only contain lowercase: Account names can only contain lowercase letters, numbers and partial Emoji
Account name length must be {min} to {ma: Account name length must be {min} to {max} characters
Modification has been submitted, it will: Modification has been submitted, it will take about 5 minutes to take effect, please check back later
The renewal order has been submitted and: The renewal order has been submitted and will take effect in 5 minutes. If the renewal does not take effect, your payment will be refunded to your payment address within 24 hours (except for transaction fees).
You have not registered for a DAS accoun: You have not registered for a DAS account yet, you cannot invite others to register, go register for a DAS account now!

All modules of DAS are open source and a: All modules of DAS are open source and are maintained by developers worldwide.
Each DAS account avatar is unique.
It takes about five minutes, so please b: It takes about five minutes, so please be patient. You can also go to the「{mePage}」page to see the accounts being registered.

Register your DAS account in your Huobi: Register your DAS account in your Huobi Wallet;
Comment your .bit account below the this: Comment your .bit account below the this tweet({link}) in DAS Twitter. The registration fee will be refunded to your DAS account by 10th September;
The registration fee will be refunded di: The registration fee will be refunded directly to your DAS account, which you can view in the「Rewards Tab」of your DAS account. Fees are refunded with CKB.

The wallet environment does not support: The wallet environment does not support {token} payments
The current wallet environment does not: The current wallet environment does not support payments using TRX, please upgrade your wallet version or register with another wallet.
If a DAS account is on sale, it is in a: If a DAS account is on sale, it is in a special status and cannot be operated other than renewed and delisted.
Full refund when account expires for rec: Full refund when account expires for recycling
It is not recommended to use hardware wa: It is not recommended to use hardware wallets. You may not be able to use DAS normally.
DO NOT use DAS with ANY hardware wallet!: DO NOT use DAS with ANY hardware wallet!
Since most hardware wallets have incompa: Since most hardware wallets have incompatibility problems.
{joinDiscord} to keep updated about the: {joinDiscord} to keep updated about the release.
Parameter error, missing order ID, pleas: Parameter error, missing order ID, please refresh the page and try again.
Powerful cross-chain capability is a uni: Powerful cross-chain capability is a unique feature of DAS, which means you can register and use DAS in multiple public chain environments. Please select the public chain you are currently using.

No need to transfer. You can view all DA: No need to transfer. You can view all DAS accounts under the current address.
Before payment, please ensure that your: Before payment, please ensure that your DAS balance is greater than {recommendedDepositAmount} CKB. After payment, the remaining amount must not be less than 116 CKB. Otherwise, the transaction can not be sent.
DAS is a smart contract that runs on the: DAS is a smart contract that runs on the Nervos. Due to the underlying logic of the contract, the remaining amount is too low (less than 116 CKB) to send a transaction.
Only supported in imToken, TokenPocket,: Only supported in imToken, TokenPocket, TronLink

Benefits of setting the reverse record: Benefits of setting the reverse record
Once it's set, your Apps will display DA: Once it's set, your Apps will display DAS account name wherever it currently displays addresses. For example, when you log in the DApp, it will show your DAS account name as if it is your username.
The reverse record of your address: The reverse record of your address
Select or enter the DAS account: Select or enter the DAS account
Setting the reverse record needs storage: Setting the reverse record needs storage space on the chain, and it will freeze {freezeCKB} CKB.
The account is not registered and does n: The account is not registered and does not support the reverse record
It is expected to take 3 minutes to be c: It is expected to take 3 minutes to be confirmed on chain.
To set the reverse record, please make s: To set the reverse record, please make sure your DAS balance is greater than 350 CKB. 201 CKB needs to be frozen as storage space on the chain. Also, the remaining amount must not be less than 116 CKB. Otherwise, the transaction can not be sent.
Your address is the Owner/Manager of {ac: Your address is the Owner/Manager of {account};
Your address is in the record of {accoun: Your address is in the record of {account}.
The reverse record is valid only if any: The reverse record is valid only if any of the following conditions is met.
Frequent operations. There are still tra: Frequent operations. There are still transactions being processed in your wallet address, please try again after 30s.
You have already set this account.
After deleting the reverse record, the f: After deleting the reverse record, the frozen {freezeCKB} CKB will be returned to your balance automatically.
The wallet does not support EIP-712 sign: The wallet does not support EIP-712 signature algorithm. Please use another wallet App and try again.
The service is under maintenance, please: The service is under maintenance, please try again later.
